rukus.text: Jin logon ney zulm bardasht kerney kay baad Allah ki raah mein tark-e-watan kiya hai hum unhen behtar say behtar thikana duniya mein ata farmyen gay aur aakhirat ka sawab to boht hi bara hai kaash kay log iss say waqif hotay
Woh jinhon ney daman-e-sabar na chora aur apney palney walay hi per bharosa kertay rahey
Aap say pehlay bhi hum mardon ko hi bhejtay rahey jin ki janib wahee utara kertay thay pus agar tum nahi jantay to ehl-e-ilm say daryaft kerlo
Daleelon aur kitabon kay sath yeh zikar (kitab) hum ney aap ki taraf utara hai kay logon ki janib jo nazil farmaya gaya hai aap ussay khol khol ker biyan ker den shayad kay woh ghoro-o-fikar keren
Bad tareen dao paich kerney walay kiya iss baat say bey khof hogaye hain kay Allah Taalaa unhen zamin mein dhansa dey ya unn kay pass aisi jagah say azab aajaye jahan ka unhen weham-o-guman bhi na ho
Ya unhen chaltay phirtay pakar ley. Yeh kissi soorat mein Allah Taalaa ko aajiz nahi ker saktay
Ya unhen dara dhamka ker pakar ley pus yaqeenan tumhara perwerdigar aala shafqat aur intehaee reham wala hai
Kiya enhon ney Allah ki makhlooq mein kissi ko bhi nahi dekha? Kay uss kay saye dayen bayen jhuk jhuk ker Allah Taalaa kay samney sir ba sujood hotay aur aajzi ka izhar kertay hain
Yaqeenan aasman-o-zamin kay kul jandar aur tamam farishtay Allah Taalaa kay samney sajday kertay hain aur zara bhi takabbur nahi kertay
Aur apney rab sau jo unn kay upper hai kapkapatay rehtay hain aur jo hukum mill jaye uss ki tameel kertay hain
